code: @Manual{,   title = {osmactive: Extract Active Travel Infrastructure from OpenStreetMap},   author = {Robin Lovelace and Joey Talbot},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://nptscot.github.io/osmactive/}, }

what: Extract Active Travel Infrastructure from OpenStreetMap
title: Extract Active Travel Infrastructure from OpenStreetMap
text: goal osmactive provide functions, example datasets documentation extracting active travel infrastructure OpenStreetMap data. Install package :

title: Extract Active Travel Infrastructure from OpenStreetMap
Extract Active Travel Infrastructure from OpenStreetMap
Extract Active Travel Infrastructure from OpenStreetMap
Extract Active Travel Infrastructure from OpenStreetMap
code: u = "https://ushift.tecnico.ulisboa.pt/content/data/lisbon_limit.geojson" f = basename(u) if (!file.exists(f)) download.file(u, f) lisbon = sf::read_sf(f) lisbon = lisbon |>   sf::st_cast("POLYGON") osm = get_travel_network("Portugal", boundary = lisbon, boundary_type = "clipsrc", force_vectortranslate = TRUE) # p = list.files("~/data/osm", pattern = "portugal*.+pbf", full.names = TRUE) # osm = sf::read_sf(p, query = "select * from lines where highway is not null") cycle_net = get_cycling_network(osm) drive_net = get_driving_network_major(osm) cycle_net = distance_to_road(cycle_net, drive_net) cycle_net = classify_cycle_infrastructure(cycle_net) m = plot_osm_tmap(cycle_net) m

title: Segregation levels — classify_cycle_infrastructure
text: function classifies OSM ways cycle infrastructure type levels given dataset.

title: Segregation levels — classify_cycle_infrastructure
Segregation levels — classify_cycle_infrastructure
text: osm input dataset segregation levels need calculated. min_distance minimum distance road cycleway considered -road. classification_type classification type used. Currently "Scotland" supported.

title: Segregation levels — classify_cycle_infrastructure
text: sf object new column cycle_segregation contains segregation levels.

title: Segregation levels — classify_cycle_infrastructure
text: See wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:cycleway taginfo.openstreetmap.org/keys/cycleway#values information cycleway values used classify cycle infrastructure. Currently, "Scotland" classification type supported. See Scottish Government's Cycling Design information.

title: Segregation levels — classify_cycle_infrastructure
code: library(tmap) #>  #> Attaching package: ‘tmap’ #> The following object is masked from ‘package:datasets’: #>  #>     rivers tmap_mode("plot") #> tmap mode set to 'plot' osm = osm_edinburgh cycle_network = get_cycling_network(osm) driving_network = get_driving_network(osm) netd = distance_to_road(cycle_network, driving_network) netc = classify_cycle_infrastructure(netd) library(sf) #> Linking to GEOS 3.10.2, GDAL 3.4.1, PROJ 8.2.1; sf_use_s2() is TRUE plot(netc["cycle_segregation"])  plot(netc["distance_to_road"])

what: Calculate distance from route network segments to roads — distance_to_road
title: Calculate distance from route network segments to roads — distance_to_road
text: function approximates distance route network nearest road. first computing sf::st_point_on_surface route network segments calculating distance nearest road using geos::geos_distance function.

title: Calculate distance from route network segments to roads — distance_to_road
Calculate distance from route network segments to roads — distance_to_road
text: rnet route network distance road needs calculated. roads road network distance needs calculated.

title: Calculate distance from route network segments to roads — distance_to_road
text: sf object new column distance_to_road contains distance road.

title: Calculate distance from route network segments to roads — distance_to_road
code: osm = osm_edinburgh cycle_network = get_cycling_network(osm) driving_network = get_driving_network(osm) edinburgh_cycle_with_distance = distance_to_road(cycle_network, driving_network)

code: get_cycling_network(   osm,   ex_c = exclude_highway_cycling(),   ex_b = exclude_bicycle_cycling() )

text: osm OSM network object ex_c vector highway values exclude ex_b vector bicycle values exclude

what: Get the OSM driving network — get_driving_network
title: Get the OSM driving network — get_driving_network
text: function returns OSM driving network excluding certain highway values.

title: Get the OSM driving network — get_driving_network
code: get_driving_network(osm, ex_d = exclude_highway_driving())  get_driving_network_major(   osm,   ex_d = exclude_highway_driving(),   pattern = "motorway|trunk|primary|secondary|tertiary" )

title: Get the OSM driving network — get_driving_network
text: osm OSM network object ex_d character string highway values exclude form value1|value2 etc pattern character string highway values define major roads form motorway|trunk|primary|secondary|tertiary

title: Get the OSM driving network — get_driving_network
text: sf object OSM driving network

title: Get the OSM network functions — get_travel_network
code: get_travel_network(   place,   extra_tags = et_active(),   columns_to_remove = c("waterway", "aerialway", "barrier", "manmade"),   ... )

title: Get the OSM network functions — get_travel_network
text: place place name bounding box passed osmextract::oe_get() extra_tags vector extra tags included OSM extract columns_to_remove vector columns removed OSM network ... Additional arguments passed osmextract::oe_get()

what: Create a tmap object for visualizing the classified cycle network — plot_osm_tmap
title: Create a tmap object for visualizing the classified cycle network — plot_osm_tmap
text: Create tmap object visualizing classified cycle network

title: Create a tmap object for visualizing the classified cycle network — plot_osm_tmap
code: plot_osm_tmap(   cycle_network_classified,   popup.vars = c("name", "cycle_segregation", "distance_to_road", "maxspeed", "highway",     "cycleway", "other_tags"),   lwd = 4,   palette = "-PuBuGn" )

title: Create a tmap object for visualizing the classified cycle network — plot_osm_tmap
text: cycle_network_classified sf object classified cycle network popup.vars vector variables displayed popup lwd line width cycle network palette palette used cycle segregation levels
